hero.title: Affordable Independent Houses for Sale in Sector 65 Gurugram
description: Sector 65 Gurugram is a premium yet well-planned residential locality located along Golf Course Extension Road. Buyers searching for an affordable house for sale in Sector 65 Gurugram are drawn to its modern infrastructure, wide roads, and excellent connectivity to key areas like Sohna Road, Southern Peripheral Road (SPR), and NH-48. The sector is surrounded by reputed residential societies, commercial hubs, schools, hospitals, and daily convenience markets, making it ideal for family living.

Affordable houses for sale in Sector 65 Gurugram offer a balanced lifestyle with the advantage of independent living in a rapidly developing area. The locality is known for its peaceful environment, good civic amenities, and strong future growth potential. With continuous infrastructure upgrades and rising demand along Golf Course Extension Road, Sector 65 remains a smart choice for end-users and investors looking for long-term value appreciation.
